body.name: Bidfoce Switch Controller for Nintendo Switch/Switch Lite/Switch Oled, Switch Pro Controller with Programming Back Buttons Turbo Motion Vibration Screenshot and LED Light,1000mAh【Upgraded】
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 8 mins
features: 【9 Colors Adjustable LED Light with 4 Light Modes】 This switch pro controller adds color and flair to your gameplay with 9 fully customizable RGB LED lights. Adjust the brightness, cycle through different lighting effects like breathing and flashing, or choose your favorite static color. Set the mood with the lighting.

【Wide Compatibility】 The switch controller can connect wirelessly to the Nin-tendo Switch/Switch Lite/Switch OLED, as well as Windows PCs. Play your favorite games on multiple screens around the house with this nin-tendo switch pro controller. The wireless switch controller supports up to 4 players for competitive local multiplayer action.

【Programmable Back Buttons Function】 The switch controller allows you to program complex button combinations to the multi-function M1/M2 buttons for easier advanced maneuvers. Map over 15 different controller inputs to suit your playstyle. Remap buttons to avoid wear and extend longevity.

【1000mAh Long Battery Life】 The built-in 1000mAh battery of this wireless switch controller provides an impressive 20 hours of gameplay per charge. Plus, the pro switch controller reconnects to your device instantly from a 10m range without lag or interference. Always stay in the game.

【Comfortable Design & Precision Control】 The switch remote controller has functions like vibration motors, motion controls and hall effect analog sticks deliver ultra-responsive feedback. An ergonomic non-slip grip design and adjustable trigger stops of the nin-tendo wireless switch controller provide maximum gaming endurance even in marathon sessions. Feel every moment like a pro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gave this to my son for Christmas and he loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, struggles with BT PC connectivity
reviews.reviewText: Works great with switch, was hoping to buy more so I could add them to my collection to use om pc. But after I connect them to my pc and they fall asleep, I have to remove them from my device and then restart the pairing process. Now I'm not sure if I'm doing something wrong but it but seems to always want to be in switch paring mode instead of pc. I'd love It remember which pairing mode it was last in and then auto-connect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great controller for our son’s switch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Switch Controllers, great battery life!
reviews.reviewText: These controllers work great on a Nintendo Switch, they are easy to pair, the battery lasts through days of game play. The best part they are easier to operate than the tiny controllers that come with the Switch. Excellent value for the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Debe ser más especifico para pc von juegos fuera d3 steam no sirve no recomendado

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's good for the price, but not for daily gamers.
reviews.reviewText: Wanted another controller for our Switch but didn't want to pay the OEM price.The joystick sticks out too much and the controller definitely has a cheap feel to it especially when it shakes. I decided to keep it cause it works and the price really is cheap.If you're looking for a nicer controller for long term I wouldn't recommend this, but it's ok for casual gaming.*After 2 weeks of using the controller would go towards right by itself sometimes, only way to fix it is to disconnect and reconnect the controller. deducting a star cause of that*

reviews.reviewText: Works great and is compatible to the switch controllers
